  • Method Details

    • setupFileLogs

      public boolean setupFileLogs​(String errorFilePath, String warningFilePath, String statusFilePath)
      Setup file logs and delete existing files.
      Parameters:
      errorFilePath - path to error log file
      warningFilePath - path to warning log file
      statusFilePath - path to status log file
      Returns:
      true on success, false if there were one or more problems encountered

    • setupFileLogs

      public boolean setupFileLogs​(String errorFilePath, String warningFilePath, String statusFilePath, boolean appendFiles)
      Setup file logs and only delete existing files if the flag is true.
      Parameters:
      errorFilePath - path to error log file
      warningFilePath - path to warning log file
      statusFilePath - path to status log file
      appendFiles - true to append any existing files, false to overwrite
      Returns:
      true on success, false if there were one or more problems encountered

    • setupFileLogs

      public boolean setupFileLogs​(String errorFilePath, String warningFilePath, String statusFilePath, boolean appendFiles, String header)
      Setup file logs and only delete existing files if the flag is true. Also write the given header to the files if non-null.
      Parameters:
      errorFilePath - path to error log file
      warningFilePath - path to warning log file
      statusFilePath - path to status log file
      appendFiles - true to append any existing files, false to overwrite
      header - a string header to be written to each of the output files
      Returns:
      true on success, false if there were one or more problems encountered

    • setupTerminalLog

      public boolean setupTerminalLog()
      Setup window terminal logger.
      Returns:
      true on success

    • padString

      public static String padString​(String text, int lineWidth, LogManager.TextAlignment alignment)
      Constructs a new string with extra space padding, such that the returned string is guaranteed to be of length lineWidth, with the desired text alignment. However, if the input text is longer than the desired line width, the input text is immediately returned unmodified.
      Parameters:
      text - text used to construct new string with extra padding
      lineWidth - desired total line width
      alignment - desired text alignment (left, right, or center)
      Returns:
      new string with extra space padding, but if input text is longer than lineWidth, then the input text is returned unmodified

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
